title: [Feature require] Allow another port, not just only 3000 port
body:
I want to run multiple agent with one server. but when start single agent which occupy 3000 port, so other agent can not be launched.

I checked this problem, this port occupation occurs on @ai16z/client-direct module.

Inside  @ai16z/client-direct module, 3000 port is hard coded.
author: joshephan

comments.body: use can set SERVER_PORT in .env file to your desired port number to change the port.
@divyangchauhan Oh my mistake. it works. Thanks.

satisfaction_conditions: A way to configure the port number for running multiple agents simultaneously
Information about existing configuration options that aren't immediately obvious in the codebase
A solution that doesn't require code modification
